name: SanDefense
description:
Created for Global Game Jam 2017, SanDefense is a tower defense game in which players take up the task of defending a sand castle against waves of crabs attempting to destroy it.  After each wave, an ocean wave comes up to wipe away the defenses and drop rocks restricting the places where defenses can be placed.

Credits: 

J.D. Kelly

Ethan Nichols

Tanat Boozayaangool

Julieanne Giorlando

Rachel King
